title: UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette, Professional Flash Non Toxic Safe Tattoo Halloween FX Party Artist Fancy Makeup Painting Kit For Kids and Adult
descriptions:
Introducing the UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette, the ultimate professional makeup painting kit for kids and adults! 

With its 20 color palette, featuring a range of flash and Aqua shades including gold, silver, pink, purple, red, yellow, blue, green, brown, black, and white, this palette allows for endless creativity and variety of artistic and special effects. The creamy and intensive pigmentation of the colors ensures vibrant and color-saturated looks that are sure to make a statement.

The plastic case is not only sturdy but also convenient, making it perfect for travel and on-the-go use. The palette can be easily applied using a sponge or brush, providing ease of use and allowing for precise application. 

The non-toxic and skin-friendly oil-based formulation of the paints ensures safety for all users. The high-quality, easy-blend formula is comfortable to wear, quick-drying, and smudge-proof, providing a durable and long-lasting look. Minimal rub-off and easy wash-off with olive oil or professional waterproof makeup remover make cleanup a breeze.

The UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette is suitable for a wide range of occasions, including festivals, carnivals, birthday parties, campfires, theme parties, stage performances, and of course, Halloween! Whether you're looking to create a crown, costume, bruise, blood effect, or even cosplay, this palette has got you covered.

Don't miss out on the chance to unleash your creativity and stand out from the crowd. Grab the UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette today and let your imagination run wild!
